description.narrative: For GGF funds will support continuing implementation of programs focused on mother and child health and small homestead nutrition gardens, as well as launching new initiatives in small scale animal/bird raising, rain water harvesting, growing seedlings, and trainings in solar drying and better packaging techniques. Women groups will be taught how to collect and manage funds to sponsor entrepreneurial initiatives that help improve the quality of life for women and girls. Series of trainings and talks will be held to educate on climate change and ways to mitigate it. A strong focus of trainings will be on sustainable agriculture and environmentally friendly technologies (solar cookers, biogas stoves, etc).
